name: Slimer
description:
Its a platformer with a cute little slime what do you want more? It has currently 10 levels (later up to 30) and a level editor so that you can make your own levels!

Go through these 10 different levels which reach from simple platforming to difficult challenges and puzzles!

Want to Challenge your Friends? Then try the easy to Use Level Editor where you can create up to 9 Levels to challenge your Freinds and Enemys with complex Puzzles or challenging Gauntlets!

---

Keyboard Movement:

A, D, Left Arrow, Right Arrow - Movement

W, Up Arrow, Space - Jump

S, Down Arrow - Stomp

Controller Movement:

Left Stick - Movement

Right Face Button - Jump

Down Face Button - Stomp

---

Planned Features:

- Level 11-30

---

 Stretch Goals: (Depending on playerbase/feedback!)

- One big level in Metroidvania style with story

- Level Browser and Infinity Challenge

- More Items and Objects
